ground_truth: Another Soldier leaps from the truck onto the tank and raises his knife as he grabs Indy. They struggle and fall. Indy sits up to see Vogel standing over him, who wraps a chain around Indy's neck. Indy appears at the entrance, the chain still wrapped about his neck and held by Vogel. Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance, yanking on the chain wrapped around his neck. A Nazi Soldier approaches, and Indy hits him, knocking him onto the tank tread. The Nazi Soldier screams as he is dragged under the rolling tank. Now Indy and Vogel struggle with one another, the chain still wrapped around Indy's neck. We see Indy and Vogel struggling atop the tank, and Indy lifts his feet, lunging toward the periscope and pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed up against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi Soldier looking through the periscope pulls away from it, smiles, then turns back to it. Indy's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. Vogel pulls Indy from the periscope, and the Nazi Soldier pulls away from the periscope again. A troop truck pulls near the tank, and Henry fires the tank gun at the troop truck. Soldiers fly into the air, and the troop truck flips over and explodes. The explosion knocks Indy off the tank and onto the tread. He grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank. Vogel looks down at Indy and smiles smugly. The tank is approaching a cliff wall. As Indy tries to secure footing, Vogel steps on his hands. Brody looks at Henry. Vogel now swings a shovel at Indy, smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the tank, followed by Henry. A Nazi Soldier appears and pulls Henry down. Vogel raises the shovel above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, still hanging from the protruding gun. Indy loses his grip and now hangs from the gun suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch. He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, sending stones tumbling down over him. The Nazi Soldier knocks Henry into a pile of boxes, then punches him in the face. As the Soldier raises the gun to Henry's face, Brody hits him over the head with a canister. The Soldier falls, discharging the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets around the tank, past the Tank Driver who is manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly; then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time passing through the Tank Driver's hat. Blood flows from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward, his body depressing the levers. Indy still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves, barely missing the rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Another Combatant jumps from the lorry onto the armored vehicle and lifts his dagger as he seizes Indy. They grapple and tumble. Indy rises up to notice Vogel looming over him, who coils a chain around Indy’s throat. Indy appears at the opening, the chain still coiled about his throat and grasped by Vogel. Vogel drags Indy from the armored vehicle opening, tugging on the chain coiled around his throat. A Nazi Combatant nears, and Indy strikes him, knocking him onto the armored vehicle tread. The Nazi Combatant yells as he is pulled beneath the revolving armored vehicle. Now Indy and Vogel grapple with one another, the chain still coiled around Indy’s throat. We observe Indy and Vogel grappling atop the armored vehicle, and Indy raises his legs, lunging toward the periscope and drawing Vogel with him. Indy’s visage is pressed up against the objective of the periscope. The Nazi Combatant peering through the periscope withdraws from it, grins, then turns back to it. Indy’s visage, still pressed against the objective, is visible. Vogel drags Indy from the periscope, and the Nazi Combatant withdraws from the periscope again. A troop lorry nears the armored vehicle, and Henry fires the armored vehicle cannon at the troop lorry. Combatants soar into the sky, and the troop lorry overturns and detonates. The detonation hurls Indy off the armored vehicle and onto the tread. He clutches onto the shredded cannon extending from the side of the armored vehicle. Vogel glances down at Indy and grins smugly. The armored vehicle is nearing a precipice wall. As Indy attempts to secure footing, Vogel steps on his hands. Brody glances at Henry. Vogel now swings a spade at Indy, smashing at his hands. Brody ascends up out of the armored vehicle, followed by Henry. A Nazi Combatant emerges and drags Henry down. Vogel lifts the spade above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, still dangling from the extending cannon. Indy loses his hold and now dangles from the cannon suspended only by the strap of his leather satchel. He yells as the cannon scrapes against the precipice wall, sending rocks tumbling down over him. The Nazi Combatant strikes Henry into a heap of crates, then punches him in the visage. As the Combatant lifts the cannon to Henry’s visage, Brody strikes him over the head with a canister. The Combatant falls, firing the cannon into the sky. The projectile ricochets around the armored vehicle, past the Armored Vehicle Operator who is manipulating levers at the control console. Sparks fly; then the projectile pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time passing through the Armored Vehicle Operator’s cap. Blood flows from beneath the cap as the Armored Vehicle Operator slumps forward, his body depressing the levers. Indy still dangles from the strap of his leather satchel as the armored vehicle veers, narrowly missing the boulders and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Another Soldier leaps from the truck onto the tank and raises his knife as Indy is grabbed by him. They are struggled and fallen by them. Indy sits up to see Vogel standing over him, who wraps a chain around Indy's neck. Indy is seen at the entrance, the chain still wrapped around his neck and held by Vogel. Indy is pulled from the tank entrance by Vogel, who yanks on the chain wrapped around his neck. A Nazi Soldier approaches, and he is hit by Indy, who knocks him onto the tank tread. The Nazi Soldier screams as the rolling tank drags him under. Now Indy and Vogel are struggling with one another, the chain still wrapped around Indy's neck. Indy and Vogel are seen struggling atop the tank, and the periscope is lunged toward by Indy as he lifts his feet, pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed up against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi Soldier looking through the periscope pulls away from it, smiles, then turns back to it. Indy's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. Indy is pulled from the periscope by Vogel, and the Nazi Soldier pulls away from the periscope again. A troop truck pulls near the tank, and the tank gun is fired at the troop truck by Henry. Soldiers are flown into the air, and the troop truck is flipped over and exploded. Indy is knocked off the tank and onto the tread by the explosion. The shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank is grabbed onto by him. Indy is looked down upon by Vogel, who smiles smugly. A cliff wall is approached by the tank. As Indy tries to secure footing, his hands are stepped on by Vogel. Henry is looked at by Brody. A shovel is swung at Indy by Vogel, smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the tank, followed by Henry. A Nazi Soldier appears and pulls Henry down. The shovel is raised above his head by Vogel and crashes down on Indy, still hanging from the protruding gun. Indy's grip is lost, and he is now hanging from the gun suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch. He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, sending stones tumbling down over him. Henry is knocked into a pile of boxes, then punched in the face by the Nazi Soldier. As the gun is raised to Henry's face by the Soldier, Brody hits him over the head with a canister. The Soldier falls, discharging the gun into the air. The gun is manipulated at the control panel by the Tank Driver, who manages levers as the bullet ricochets around the tank, past him. Sparks fly; then the window is pinged against by the bullet and it ricochets once more, this time passing through the Tank Driver's hat. Blood flows from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward, his body depressing the levers. Indy still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves, barely missing the rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: A Soldier jumps from the truck onto the tank, grabbing Indy with a knife. They struggle and fall. Indy sees Vogel, who wraps a chain around Indy's neck. Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance, yanking the chain. A Nazi Soldier approaches, and Indy knocks him onto the tank tread, where he is dragged under. Indy and Vogel struggle atop the tank, with Indy lunging toward the periscope, pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face presses against the periscope lens. The Nazi Soldier looking through it smiles, then turns back. Vogel pulls Indy away. A troop truck nears, and Henry fires the tank gun, flipping and exploding the truck. The explosion knocks Indy onto the tread, where he grabs a shredded gun protruding from the tank. Vogel smiles smugly as the tank approaches a cliff wall. Indy tries to secure footing, but Vogel steps on his hands. Brody looks at Henry. Vogel swings a shovel at Indy, smashing his hands. Brody and Henry climb out of the tank, but a Nazi Soldier pulls Henry down. Vogel raises the shovel, crashing it down on Indy, who hangs from the gun by his leather pouch strap. He screams as the gun scrapes the cliff wall, sending stones tumbling. The Nazi Soldier knocks Henry into boxes, then punches him. As the Soldier raises a gun to Henry, Brody hits him with a canister. The Soldier falls, discharging the gun. The bullet ricochets around the tank, past the Tank Driver, and through his hat. Blood flows as the Tank Driver slumps, depressing levers. Indy hangs from his pouch strap as the tank swerves, narrowly missing rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: A Soldier jumps from the truck onto the tank, grabbing Indy with a knife. They struggle and fall. Indy sees Vogel, who wraps a chain around his neck. Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance. Indy hits a Nazi Soldier, knocking him onto the tank tread, where he is dragged under. Indy and Vogel struggle atop the tank, with Indy lunging toward the periscope, pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed against the lens. A Nazi Soldier smiles and looks through the periscope again. Vogel pulls Indy away. A troop truck nears, and Henry fires the tank gun, flipping and exploding the truck. The explosion knocks Indy onto the tread, where he grabs a shredded gun. Vogel smiles smugly as the tank approaches a cliff. Vogel steps on Indy's hands and swings a shovel at him. Brody and Henry climb out of the tank, but a Nazi Soldier pulls Henry down. Vogel smashes the shovel on Indy, who hangs by his leather pouch strap. The gun scrapes the cliff, sending stones down. The Soldier knocks Henry into boxes and punches him. Brody hits the Soldier with a canister, causing him to fire his gun. The bullet ricochets, hitting the Tank Driver, who slumps forward, depressing levers. Indy hangs from his pouch strap as the tank swerves, narrowly missing rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Another Soldier, with a determined leap, jumps from the truck onto the tank, brandishing his knife menacingly as he seizes Indy. They engage in a fierce struggle, eventually tumbling down together. Indy manages to sit up, only to find Vogel looming over him, who quickly wraps a heavy chain around Indy's neck. Indy appears at the entrance, the chain still tightly coiled around his neck, firmly held by Vogel. With a forceful yank, Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance, the chain constricting around his neck. A Nazi Soldier approaches menacingly, but Indy swiftly hits him, sending him sprawling onto the tank tread. The Nazi Soldier lets out a scream as he is dragged under the relentless, rolling tank. Now, Indy and Vogel are locked in a struggle with one another, the chain still wrapped around Indy's neck, constricting with every movement. We see Indy and Vogel grappling atop the tank, and Indy, with a sudden burst of energy, lifts his feet, lunging toward the periscope and dragging Vogel along with him. Indy's face is pressed firmly against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi Soldier, peering through the periscope, pulls away momentarily, smiles with satisfaction, then turns back to it. Indy's face, still pressed against the lens, is clearly visible. Vogel forcefully pulls Indy away from the periscope, and the Nazi Soldier pulls away from it once more. A troop truck approaches the tank, and Henry seizes the opportunity to fire the tank gun at the troop truck. Soldiers are sent flying into the air as the troop truck flips over and explodes in a fiery blast. The explosion sends Indy tumbling off the tank and onto the tread. He desperately grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank. Vogel looks down at Indy with a smug, self-satisfied smile. The tank is rapidly approaching a sheer cliff wall. As Indy struggles to find secure footing, Vogel cruelly steps on his hands. Brody exchanges a worried glance with Henry. Vogel now swings a shovel at Indy, viciously smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the tank, with Henry following closely behind. A Nazi Soldier appears and pulls Henry down forcefully. Vogel raises the shovel high above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, who is still precariously hanging from the protruding gun. Indy loses his grip and now dangles from the gun, suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch. He screams in desperation as the gun scrapes against the unforgiving cliff wall, sending a cascade of stones tumbling down over him. The Nazi Soldier knocks Henry into a pile of boxes, then punches him squarely in the face. As the Soldier raises the gun to Henry's face, Brody intervenes, hitting him over the head with a canister. The Soldier falls, discharging the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets wildly around the tank, narrowly missing the Tank Driver who is busy manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly as the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time passing cleanly through the Tank Driver's hat. Blood begins to flow from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward, his body pressing down on the levers. Indy still hangs precariously from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves violently, narrowly missing the rocks and causing Vogel to lose his balance and fall.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: With a determined and powerful leap, another soldier launches himself from the truck onto the tank. He brandishes his knife with a menacing flair as he aggressively seizes Indy, and they engage in an intense and fierce struggle. The combat leads them to tumble down together in a chaotic heap. Indy manages to sit up, but it is only to find Vogel looming ominously over him. Vogel wastes no time in swiftly wrapping a hefty and heavy chain around Indy's neck with a quick motion. Indy appears at the entrance, the chain still tightly coiled around his neck, firmly under Vogel's control. With a forceful yank, Vogel pulls Indy through the tank entrance, the chain constricting viciously around his neck. A Nazi soldier approaches with a menacing gait, but Indy quickly and efficiently counters by striking him hard, sending the soldier sprawling onto the tank tread. The Nazi soldier releases a blood-curdling scream as he is relentlessly dragged underneath the rolling tank. Now, Indy and Vogel are locked in a fierce struggle with one another, the chain still securely wrapped around Indy's neck, tightening with every movement. Onlookers see Indy and Vogel grappling fiercely atop the tank, and then Indy, with an unexpected burst of energy, lifts his feet and lunges toward the periscope, dragging Vogel along with him. Indy's face is pressed firmly and clearly against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi soldier, who has been peering through the periscope, momentarily pulls away, smiling with satisfaction before turning back again. Indy's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible and clear to the soldier. Vogel then forcefully pulls Indy away from the periscope, causing the Nazi soldier to pull away once more. A troop truck is approaching the tank, and Henry seizes the opportunity to fire the tank gun at the troop truck. Soldiers are sent flying dramatically into the air as the troop truck flips over and explodes in a fiery blast, sending shockwaves through the scene. The explosion propels Indy violently off the tank and onto the tread. He desperately grabs hold of the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank, clinging for his very life. Vogel looks down at Indy with a smug, self-satisfied smile as the tank hurtles rapidly toward a sheer cliff wall. As Indy struggles to find secure footing, Vogel cruelly and maliciously steps on his hands. Brody exchanges a worried glance with Henry, both showing visible concern. Vogel now swings a shovel with malicious intent at Indy, viciously smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up and out of the tank, with Henry following closely behind, trying to assist. A Nazi soldier appears and pulls Henry down with force. Vogel raises the shovel high above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, who is still precariously hanging from the protruding gun. Indy loses his grip and now dangles perilously from the gun, held only by the strap of his worn leather pouch. He screams in desperation as the gun scrapes against the unforgiving cliff wall, sending a cascade of stones tumbling down over him. The Nazi soldier then knocks Henry into a pile of boxes and punches him squarely in the face. As the soldier raises the gun to Henry's face, Brody intervenes, striking the soldier over the head with a heavy canister. The soldier falls backward, discharging the gun into the air in a chaotic burst. The bullet ricochets wildly around the tank, narrowly missing the tank driver who is busily manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly as the bullet pings against the window and ricochets again, this time passing cleanly through the tank driver's hat. Blood begins to flow from beneath the hat as the tank driver slumps forward, his body pressing down on the levers. Indy still hangs precariously from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves violently, narrowly missing the rocks and causing Vogel to lose his balance and fall.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Another Soldier, with a determined leap, propels himself from the truck onto the tank, his eyes fixed on Indy as he raises his knife menacingly. In a swift motion, he grabs Indy, initiating a fierce struggle between them. As they grapple, their combined weight causes them to lose balance and tumble down. Indy, recovering from the fall, sits up only to find Vogel looming over him, who quickly wraps a chain around Indy's neck with a firm grip. Indy, now appearing at the tank's entrance, is still ensnared by the chain, which Vogel holds tightly. With a forceful yank, Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance, the chain constricting around his neck. As a Nazi Soldier approaches with intent, Indy reacts swiftly, delivering a powerful blow that sends the Soldier sprawling onto the tank tread. The Soldier's scream pierces the air as he is dragged under the relentless rolling of the tank. Meanwhile, Indy and Vogel continue their intense struggle, the chain still tightly wrapped around Indy's neck. The scene shifts to the top of the tank, where Indy and Vogel are locked in combat. Indy, seizing an opportunity, lifts his feet and lunges toward the periscope, dragging Vogel along with him. Indy's face is pressed firmly against the lens of the periscope, startling the Nazi Soldier who is peering through it. The Soldier, momentarily taken aback, pulls away from the periscope, a smile playing on his lips before he returns to his post. Indy's face remains visible, pressed against the lens, until Vogel forcefully pulls him away, causing the Soldier to once again retreat from the periscope. As a troop truck draws near the tank, Henry seizes the moment to fire the tank gun at the truck. The impact sends Soldiers flying through the air as the truck flips over and erupts in a fiery explosion. The force of the blast knocks Indy off the tank, and he lands precariously on the tread. Desperately, he grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the tank's side. Vogel, looking down at Indy with a smug smile, is aware that the tank is rapidly approaching a cliff wall. Indy, struggling to find secure footing, feels the pressure as Vogel steps on his hands. Brody exchanges a worried glance with Henry. Vogel, now wielding a shovel, swings it at Indy, aiming to smash his hands. Brody, determined to help, climbs out of the tank, with Henry following closely behind. A Nazi Soldier appears, pulling Henry down with force. Vogel, raising the shovel high above his head, brings it crashing down on Indy, who is still clinging to the protruding gun. The impact causes Indy to lose his grip, leaving him hanging precariously by the strap of his leather pouch. He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, dislodging stones that tumble down over him. Meanwhile, the Nazi Soldier knocks Henry into a pile of boxes and delivers a punch to his face. As the Soldier raises his gun to Henry's face, Brody intervenes, striking the Soldier over the head with a canister. The Soldier collapses, and his gun discharges into the air. The bullet ricochets wildly around the tank, narrowly missing the Tank Driver who is busy manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly as the bullet pings against the window, ricocheting once more and passing through the Tank Driver's hat. Blood begins to flow from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward, his body inadvertently pressing down on the levers. Indy, still hanging by the strap of his leather pouch, feels the tank swerve violently, narrowly avoiding the rocks and causing Vogel to lose his footing and fall.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Another Soldier leaps from the truck onto the tank, initiating a struggle with Indy that results in both falling. Indy sits up to find Vogel standing over him, who wraps a chain around Indy's neck and pulls him from the tank entrance. As a Nazi Soldier approaches, Indy knocks him onto the tank tread, where he is dragged under the rolling tank. Indy and Vogel continue their struggle atop the tank, with Indy lunging toward the periscope, pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed against the periscope lens, causing the Nazi Soldier using it to pull away and then return, only to see Indy's face again. Vogel pulls Indy away from the periscope. Meanwhile, a troop truck approaches, and Henry fires the tank gun at it, causing an explosion that flips the truck and sends soldiers flying. The blast knocks Indy onto the tank tread, where he clings to a protruding gun. Vogel, smiling smugly, steps on Indy's hands as the tank nears a cliff wall. Brody and Henry climb out of the tank, but a Nazi Soldier pulls Henry down and punches him. As the Soldier raises a gun to Henry's face, Brody knocks him out with a canister, causing the gun to discharge. The bullet ricochets around the tank, injuring the Tank Driver, whose body slumps forward, affecting the controls. Indy, still hanging from his leather pouch strap, is nearly scraped off by the cliff wall, while Vogel falls as the tank swerves to avoid the rocks.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Another soldier, wearing the standard-issue uniform of the German army in World War II, leaps from the truck onto the tank and raises his knife as he grabs Indy. They struggle and fall. Indy sits up to see Vogel, a high-ranking officer known for his ruthless tactics, standing over him, who wraps a chain around Indy's neck. Indy appears at the entrance, the chain still wrapped about his neck and held by Vogel. Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance, yanking on the chain wrapped around his neck. A Nazi soldier approaches, and Indy hits him, knocking him onto the tank tread of the Panzer, a German medium tank model widely used during the war. The Nazi soldier screams as he is dragged under the rolling tank. Now Indy and Vogel struggle with one another, the chain still wrapped around Indy's neck. We see Indy and Vogel struggling atop the tank, an essential piece of war machinery crucial for the German blitzkrieg strategy, and Indy lifts his feet, lunging toward the periscope, an optical device used for observing outside the tank, and pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed up against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi soldier looking through the periscope pulls away from it, smiles, aware of the tank's dominance on the battlefield, then turns back to it. Indy's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. Vogel pulls Indy from the periscope, and the Nazi soldier pulls away from the periscope again. A troop truck, heavily armored and used for transporting soldiers, pulls near the tank, and Henry fires the tank gun at the troop truck. Soldiers fly into the air, and the troop truck flips over and explodes. The explosion knocks Indy off the tank and onto the tread, designed to provide better traction on various terrains. He grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank. Vogel looks down at Indy and smiles smugly, confident in his perceived victory. The tank is approaching a cliff wall, a natural barrier posing a threat to both sides. As Indy tries to secure footing, Vogel steps on his hands. Brody, the archaeologist and Indy's long-time friend, looks at Henry. Vogel now swings a shovel at Indy, smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the tank, followed by Henry. A Nazi soldier appears and pulls Henry down. Vogel raises the shovel above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, still hanging from the protruding gun. Indy loses his grip and now hangs from the gun, suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch, often used to carry vital archaeological notes. He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, sending stones tumbling down over him. The Nazi soldier knocks Henry into a pile of boxes, presumably filled with wartime supplies, then punches him in the face. As the soldier raises the gun to Henry's face, Brody hits him over the head with a canister, used for storing fuel or ammunition in the field. The soldier falls, discharging the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets around the tank, past the tank driver who is manipulating levers at the control panel, designed for navigation and operation. Sparks fly; then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time passing through the tank driver's hat. Blood flows from under the hat as the tank driver slumps forward, his body depressing the levers, causing the tank to veer off course. Indy still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves, barely missing the rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. He grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank. Vogel looks down at Indy and smiles smugly. The tank is approaching a cliff wall. As Indy tries to secure footing Vogel steps on his hands. Brody looks at Henry. Vogel now swings a shovel at Indy smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the tank followed by Henry. A Nazi Soldier appears and pulls Henry down. Vogel raises the shovel above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy still hanging from the protruding gun. Indy loses his grip and now hangs from the gun suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch. He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall sending stones tumbling down over him. The Nazi Soldier knocks Henry into a pile of boxes then punches him in the face. As the Soldier raises the gun to Henry's face Brody hits him over the head with a canister. The Soldier falls discharging the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets around the tank past the Tank Driver who is manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more this time passing through the Tank Driver's hat. Blood flows from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward his body depressing the levers Indy still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves barely missing the rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Another Soldier leaps from the truck onto the tank and raises his knife as he grabs Indy. They struggle and fall. Indy sits up to see Vogel standing over him who wraps a chain around Indy's neck. Indy appears at the entrance the chain still wrapped about his neck and held by Vogel. Vogel pulls Indy from the tank entrance yanking on the chain wrapped around his neck. A Nazi Soldier approaches and Indy hits him knocking him onto the tank tread. The Nazi Soldier screams as he is dragged under the rolling tank. Now Indy and Vogel struggle with one another the chain still wrapped around Indy's neck. We see Indy and Vogel struggling atop the tank and Indy lifts his feet lunging toward the periscope and pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed up against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi Soldier looking through the periscope pulls away from it smiles then turns back to it. Indy's face still pressed against the lens is visible. Vogel pulls Indy from the periscope and the Nazi Soldier pulls away from the periscope again. A troop truck pulls near the tank and Henry fires the tank gun at the troop truck. Soldiers fly into the air and the troop truck flips over and explodes. The explosion knocks Indy off the tank and onto the tread. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. As Indy tries to secure footing Vogel steps on his hands. Brody looks at Henry. Vogel now swings a shovel at Indy smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the tank followed by Henry. test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Another Soldier leaps from the truck onto the tank and raises his knife as he grabs Indy. They struggle and fall. Indy sits up to see Vogel standing over him who wraps a chain around Indy's neck. The Soldier falls discharging the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets around the tank past the Tank Driver who is manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more this time passing through the Tank Driver's hat. Blood flows from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward his body depressing the levers Indy still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves barely missing the rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: Another chef leaps from the truck onto the tank and raises his knife as he grabs a librarian. They struggle and fall. The librarian sits up to see a gardener standing over him, who wraps a chain around the librarian's neck. The librarian appears at the entrance, the chain still wrapped about his neck and held by the gardener. The gardener pulls the librarian from the tank entrance, yanking on the chain wrapped around his neck. A pizza maker approaches, and the librarian hits him, knocking him onto the tank tread. The pizza maker screams as he is dragged under the rolling tank. Now the librarian and the gardener struggle with one another, the chain still wrapped around the librarian's neck. We see the librarian and the gardener struggling atop the tank, and the librarian lifts his feet, lunging toward the periscope and pulling the gardener with him. The librarian's face is pressed up against the lens of the periscope. The actor looking through the periscope pulls away from it, smiles, then turns back to it. The librarian's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. The gardener pulls the librarian from the periscope, and the actor pulls away from the periscope again. A florist's truck pulls near the tank, and a tailor fires the tank gun at the florist's truck. Soldiers fly into the air, and the florist's truck flips over and explodes. The explosion knocks the librarian off the tank and onto the tread. He grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank. The gardener looks down at the librarian and smiles smugly. The tank is approaching a cliff wall. As the librarian tries to secure footing, the gardener steps on his hands. A baker looks at the tailor. The gardener now swings a shovel at the librarian, smashing at his hands. The baker climbs up out of the tank, followed by the tailor. A mechanic appears and pulls the tailor down. The gardener raises the shovel above his head and brings it crashing down on the librarian, still hanging from the protruding gun. The librarian loses his grip and now hangs from the gun suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch. He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, sending stones tumbling down over him. The mechanic knocks the tailor into a pile of boxes, then punches him in the face. As the mechanic raises the gun to the tailor's face, the baker hits him over the head with a canister. The mechanic falls, discharging the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets around the tank, past the musician who is manipulating levers at the control panel. Sparks fly; then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time passing through the musician's hat. Blood flows from under the hat as the musician slumps forward, his body depressing the levers. The librarian still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves, barely missing the rocks and causing the gardener to fall.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Another Soldier leaps from the bicycle onto the submarine and raises his spoon as he grabs Indy. They struggle and fall. Indy sits up to see Vogel standing over him, who wraps a rope around Indy's waist. Indy appears at the entrance, the rope still wrapped about his waist and held by Vogel. Vogel pulls Indy from the submarine entrance, yanking on the rope wrapped around his waist. A Nazi Soldier approaches, and Indy hits him, knocking him onto the submarine propeller. The Nazi Soldier screams as he is dragged under the rolling submarine. Now Indy and Vogel struggle with one another, the rope still wrapped around Indy's waist. We see Indy and Vogel struggling atop the submarine, and Indy lifts his feet, lunging toward the telescope and pulling Vogel with him. Indy's face is pressed up against the lens of the telescope. The Nazi Soldier looking through the telescope pulls away from it, smiles, then turns back to it. Indy's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. Vogel pulls Indy from the telescope, and the Nazi Soldier pulls away from the telescope again. A helium balloon pulls near the submarine, and Henry fires the submarine cannon at the helium balloon. Soldiers fly into the air, and the helium balloon flips over and explodes. The explosion knocks Indy off the submarine and onto the propeller. He grabs onto the frayed hose protruding from the side of the submarine. Vogel looks down at Indy and smiles smugly. The submarine is approaching a cliff wall. As Indy tries to secure footing, Vogel steps on his hands. Brody looks at Henry. Vogel now swings a broom at Indy, smashing at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the submarine, followed by Henry. A Nazi Soldier appears and pulls Henry down. Vogel raises the broom above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, still hanging from the protruding hose. Indy loses his grip and now hangs from the hose suspended only by the strap of his leather backpack. He screams as the hose scrapes against the cliff wall, sending pebbles tumbling down over him. The Nazi Soldier knocks Henry into a pile of barrels, then punches him in the face. As the Soldier raises the slingshot to Henry's face, Brody hits him over the head with a bucket. The Soldier falls, discharging the slingshot into the air. The bullet ricochets around the submarine, past the Submarine Operator who is manipulating dials at the control panel. Sparks fly; then the bullet pings against the mirror and ricochets once more, this time passing through the Submarine Operator's cap. Blood flows from under the cap as the Submarine Operator slumps forward, his body depressing the dials. Indy still hangs from the strap of his leather backpack as the submarine swerves, barely missing the rocks and causing Vogel to fall.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Another Soldier descends from the truck onto the tank and brandishes his knife as he nudges Indy. They jostle and tumble. Indy springs up to see Vogel looming over him, who tosses a chain around Indy's neck. Indy materializes at the entrance, the chain still tossed about his neck and grasped by Vogel. Vogel maneuvers Indy from the tank entrance, tugging on the chain looped around his neck. A Nazi Soldier advances, and Indy elbows him, toppling him onto the tank tread. The Nazi Soldier bellows as he is pulled under the moving tank. Now Indy and Vogel grapple with each other, the chain still wound around Indy's neck. We see Indy and Vogel grappling atop the tank, and Indy swings his feet, vaulting toward the periscope and dragging Vogel with him. Indy's face is squashed against the lens of the periscope. The Nazi Soldier peering through the periscope recoils from it, grins, then returns to it. Indy's face, still squashed against the lens, is visible. Vogel hoists Indy from the periscope, and the Nazi Soldier recoils from the periscope again. A troop truck rolls near the tank, and Henry blasts the tank gun at the troop truck. Soldiers soar into the air, and the troop truck tumbles over and detonates. The detonation propels Indy off the tank and onto the tread. He clutches onto the shattered gun protruding from the side of the tank. Vogel peers down at Indy and grins smugly. The tank is nearing a cliff wall. As Indy attempts to brace himself, Vogel plants his foot on his hands. Brody glances at Henry. Vogel now wields a shovel at Indy, smacking at his hands. Brody ascends out of the tank, followed by Henry. A Nazi Soldier emerges and tugs Henry down. Vogel hoists the shovel above his head and slams it down on Indy, still hanging from the protruding gun. Indy loses his grip and now dangles from the gun suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch. He hollers as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, sending stones cascading down over him. The Nazi Soldier shoves Henry into a heap of boxes, then strikes him in the face. As the Soldier raises the gun to Henry's face, Brody taps him over the head with a canister. The Soldier collapses, firing the gun into the air. The bullet ricochets around the tank, past the Tank Driver who is maneuvering levers at the control panel. Sparks scatter; then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time skimming the Tank Driver's hat. Blood trickles from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward, his body pressing the levers. Indy still dangles from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank veers, narrowly missing the rocks and causing Vogel to stumble.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Another Backpack leaps from the wheelbarrow onto the bicycle and raises its spoon as it grabs the kite. They struggle and tumble. The kite sits up to see the stapler standing over it, who wraps a ribbon around the kite's beak. The kite appears at the doorway, the ribbon still wrapped about its beak and held by the stapler. The stapler pulls the kite from the bicycle doorway, yanking on the ribbon wrapped around its beak. A Pirate approaches, and the kite hits it, knocking it onto the bicycle spoke. The Pirate screams as it is dragged under the rolling bicycle. Now the kite and the stapler struggle with one another, the ribbon still wrapped around the kite's beak. We see the kite and the stapler struggling atop the bicycle, and the kite lifts its hands, lunging toward the telescope and pulling the stapler with it. The kite's face is pressed up against the lens of the telescope. The Pizza looking through the telescope pulls away from it, smiles, then turns back to it. The kite's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. The stapler pulls the kite from the telescope, and the Pizza pulls away from the telescope again. A circus wagon pulls near the bicycle, and the squirrel fires the bicycle horn at the circus wagon. Clowns fly into the air, and the circus wagon flips over and explodes. The explosion knocks the kite off the bicycle and onto the spoke. It grabs onto the stitched umbrella protruding from the side of the bicycle. The stapler looks down at the kite and smiles smugly. The bicycle is approaching a waterfall. As the kite tries to secure footing, the stapler steps on its hands. The penguin looks at the squirrel. The stapler now swings a broom at the kite, smashing at its hands. The penguin climbs up out of the bicycle, followed by the squirrel. A Pirate appears and pulls the squirrel down. The stapler raises the broom above its head and brings it crashing down on the kite, still hanging from the protruding umbrella. The kite loses its grip and now hangs from the umbrella suspended only by the strap of its velvet pouch. It screams as the umbrella scrapes against the waterfall, sending pebbles tumbling down over it. The Pirate knocks the squirrel into a pile of pillows, then punches it in the face. As the Pirate raises the broom to the squirrel's face, the penguin hits it over the head with a kettle. The Pirate falls, discharging the broom into the air. The bullet ricochets around the bicycle, past the Bicycle Rider who is manipulating pedals at the control panel. Sparks fly; then the bullet pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time passing through the Bicycle Rider's helmet. Blood flows from under the helmet as the Bicycle Rider slumps forward, its body depressing the pedals. The kite still hangs from the strap of its velvet pouch as the bicycle swerves, barely missing the bushes and causing the stapler to fall.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Another Artist tumbles from the helicopter onto the boat and tosses his brush as he catches Indy. They quarrel and tumble. Indy kneels up to see Vogel crouching over him, who slings a rope around Indy's waist. Indy emerges at the window, the rope still looped around his waist and clutched by Vogel. Vogel hoists Indy from the boat window, tugging on the rope looped around his waist. A Circus Performer approaches, and Indy nudges him, toppling him onto the boat paddle. The Circus Performer yelps as he is carried under the turning boat. Now Indy and Vogel quarrel with one another, the rope still looped around Indy's waist. We see Indy and Vogel quarrelling atop the boat, and Indy pushes his knees, lunging toward the periscope and dragging Vogel with him. Indy's nose is squashed up against the lens of the periscope. The Circus Performer peering through the periscope steps away from it, nods, then pivots back to it. Indy's nose, still squashed against the lens, is distinct. Vogel drags Indy from the periscope, and the Circus Performer steps away from the periscope once more. A delivery van rolls near the boat, and Henry launches the boat cannon at the delivery van. Clowns fly into the air, and the delivery van somersaults over and detonates. The detonation propels Indy off the boat and onto the paddle. He clings onto the twisted rail protruding from the side of the boat. Vogel peers down at Indy and smirks arrogantly. The boat is nearing a rock face. As Indy attempts to gain balance, Vogel stamps on his fingers. Brody glances at Henry. Vogel now wields a broom at Indy, crashing at his fingers. Brody clambers up out of the boat, followed by Henry. A Circus Performer emerges and drags Henry away. Vogel lifts the broom above his shoulders and brings it crashing down on Indy, still dangling from the protruding rail. Indy loses his hold and now dangles from the rail suspended only by the strap of his satchel. He cries out as the rail scrapes against the rock face, sending pebbles cascading down over him. The Circus Performer sends Henry into a stack of crates, then slaps him in the jaw. As the Performer elevates the hammer to Henry's chin, Brody knocks him over the head with a bucket. The Performer topples, firing the hammer into the air. The projectile ricochets around the boat, past the Boat Pilot who is twiddling knobs at the control panel. Sparks dart; then the projectile pings against the glass and ricochets once more, this time skimming through the Boat Pilot's cap. Red liquid trickles from beneath the cap as the Boat Pilot slumps forward, his body pressing the knobs. Indy still dangles from the strap of his satchel as the boat veers, narrowly dodging the boulders and causing Vogel to topple.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Another Soldier bounces from the bicycle onto the boat and lifts his spoon as he nudges Indy. They wrestle and tumble. Indy rises to see Vogel towering over him, who ties a string around Indy’s waist. Indy emerges at the window, the string still tied around his waist and held by Vogel. Vogel drags Indy from the boat window, tugging on the string tied around his waist. A Nazi Soldier approaches, and Indy taps him, sending him onto the boat deck. The Nazi Soldier yelps as he’s swallowed by the spinning boat. Now Indy and Vogel wrestle with one another, the string still tied around Indy’s waist. We see Indy and Vogel wrestling atop the boat, and Indy lifts his hands, diving toward the binoculars and dragging Vogel with him. Indy’s face is squished up against the glass of the binoculars. The Nazi Soldier peering through the binoculars withdraws from it, grins, then turns back to it. Indy’s face, still squished against the glass, is visible. Vogel drags Indy from the binoculars, and the Nazi Soldier pulls away from the binoculars again. A freight wagon inches near the boat, and Henry launches the boat cannon at the freight wagon. Soldiers somersault into the air, and the freight wagon spins over and erupts. The blast propels Indy off the boat and onto the deck. He clutches onto the bent trumpet protruding from the side of the boat. Vogel peers down at Indy and smirks arrogantly. The boat is nearing a mountain face. As Indy attempts to gain balance, Vogel presses on his hands. Brody glances at Henry. Vogel now swings a broom at Indy, swatting at his hands. Brody climbs up out of the boat, followed by Henry. A Nazi Soldier emerges and tugs Henry down. Vogel hoists the broom above his head and brings it crashing down on Indy, still dangling from the protruding trumpet. Indy loses his hold and now hangs from the trumpet suspended only by the strap of his leather satchell. He bellows as the trumpet scrapes against the mountain face, causing pebbles to cascade down over him. The Nazi Soldier shoves Henry into a stack of crates, then slaps him in the jaw. As the Soldier lifts a flashlight to Henry’s temple, Brody bonks him over the head with a jar. The Soldier collapses, firing the flashlight into the sky. The light bounces around the boat, past the Boat Helmsman who is twisting dials at the control station. Sparks burst; then the light beams against the window and bounces once more, this time passing through the Boat Helmsman’s cap. Paint spouts from under the cap as the Boat Helmsman slouches forward, his body pressing the dials. Indy still dangles from the strap of his leather satchel as the boat veers, narrowly missing the boulders and causing Vogel to topple.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A Pirate dives from the submarine onto the helicopter and swings his lasso as he yanks Trevor. They bicker and topple. Trevor kneels up to see Marvin looming over him, who drapes a ribbon around Trevor's forehead. Trevor emerges at the tunnel, the ribbon still looped about his forehead and gripped by Marvin. Marvin drags Trevor from the helicopter tunnel, tugging on the ribbon looped around his forehead. A Robot Pirate nears, and Trevor kicks him, sending him onto the helicopter rotor. The Robot Pirate wails as he is dragged under the spinning helicopter. Now Trevor and Marvin bicker with each other, the ribbon still looped around Trevor's forehead. We see Trevor and Marvin bickering atop the helicopter, and Trevor stretches his legs, lunging toward the binoculars and dragging Marvin with him. Trevor's face is pressed up against the lens of the binoculars. The Robot Pirate peering through the binoculars retreats from it, grins, then turns back to it. Trevor's face, still pressed against the lens, is visible. Marvin drags Trevor from the binoculars, and the Robot Pirate retreats from the binoculars again. A cargo plane maneuvers close to the helicopter, and Oscar fires the helicopter cannon at the cargo plane. Pilots catapult into the clouds, and the cargo plane spirals down and erupts. The blast shoves Trevor off the helicopter and onto the rotor. He clutches onto the shattered spear jutting from the side of the helicopter. Marvin peers down at Trevor and grins arrogantly. The helicopter is nearing a cave ceiling. As Trevor tries to plant his feet, Marvin squashes his fingers. Clyde stares at Oscar. Marvin now swings a broom at Trevor, clobbering at his fingers. Clyde scales up out of the helicopter, followed by Oscar. A Robot Pirate surfaces and drags Oscar down. Marvin hoists the broom above his head and slams it down on Trevor, still dangling from the jutting spear. Trevor loses his hold and now dangles from the spear attached only by the strap of his canvas bag. He wails as the spear grazes against the cave ceiling, hurling pebbles tumbling down over him. The Robot Pirate shoves Oscar into a pile of barrels, then jabs him in the jaw. As the Pirate hoists the spear to Oscar's jaw, Clyde clobbers him over the head with a barrel. The Pirate crumples, firing the spear into the sky. The spear ricochets around the helicopter, past the Helicopter Pilot who is twisting dials at the control board. Sparks scatter; then the spear pings against the window and ricochets once more, this time slicing through the Helicopter Pilot's helmet. Ink trickles from under the helmet as the Helicopter Pilot lurches forward, his limbs pressing the dials. Trevor still dangles from the strap of his canvas bag as the helicopter veers, narrowly dodging the stalagmites and causing Marvin to tumble.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: A soldier leaps from a truck onto the tank, attacking Indy with a knife. Indy struggles with him and falls. Vogel chains Indy’s neck and yanks him. As another Nazi approaches, Indy knocks him under the tank tread. Indy and Vogel continue their struggle, the chain still around Indy’s neck. They lunge toward a periscope, allowing a Nazi soldier to see Indy’s face pressed against the lens. Vogel pulls Indy away just before Henry fires the tank gun at a troop truck, causing an explosion that throws Indy off the tank. Clinging to a protruding gun, Indy struggles as the tank nears a cliff. Vogel smashes Indy’s hands with a shovel, and Indy hangs only by his pouch strap. Meanwhile, Brody saves Henry from a Nazi soldier by hitting him with a canister, accidentally causing the soldier’s gun to fire. The bullet ricochets, hitting the Tank Driver, who slumps and causes the tank to swerve, narrowly missing rocks and causing Vogel to fall.
